Posts.Content: Dear Folks, I will gather the information and place my stats in the signature in the future... new to this. I am going in to my urologist on Monday to get the catheter removed (yeah!) and he is going to talk about bladder control and penile rehabilitation. Just for fun I am going to ask him if this is what he has in mind (from The Wings of Eagles with John Wayne - who is encouraged by a friend after a paralyzing accident)... http://www.tcm.com/mediaroom/video/4...That-Toe-.html God's strength and healing to you all! Mike G

Posts.Title: Thanks for Letting Me Eavesdrop

Posts.Content: Dear Folks, Thanks for letting me "eaves drop" over the past weeks. I was diagnosed with prostate cancer on Christmas Eve (what a present!) - 4 out of 12 of the nodules and a Gleason Score of 8. I felt like a dead man walking for the past few weeks. Last Monday, I underwent a radical prostate removal (what fun) and am recovering... each day a bit better. The blessing is this - when I went in to get the staples removed, the urologist came in with a big grin on his face and showed me the pathology report. 10 percent on the gland had been invaded - the margins were clear as were the lymph nodes and the sperm vesicles. In other words, about as good as you could get. I was shocked - expecting the worst. I want you all to know that I had a lot of people praying for me... and that in the future I will keep you all in my thoughts and prayers. Forgive me - I'm a Lutheran minister and am used to sharing this way... "Oh give thanks unto the Lord for He is good and His love endures forever" (Psalm 106:1). I will pray for your healing and the strength to face whatever faces you in the future. FMG

Thanks for all of your encouragement... may the Lord grant you strength and healing. I just looked up the scene from "The Wings of Eagles with John Wayne about his friend coming to the hospital after a paralyzing accident... thought I'd show it to my urologist and ask him if this is what he has in mind... http://www.tcm.com/mediaroom/video/4...That-Toe-.html.
